content: कुहुः, कुहूः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} New moon day, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the last day of a lunar month when the moon is invisible; करगतैव गता यदियं कुहूः <ls>N. 4. 57.</ls> {@--2@} The deity that presides over this day; <ls>Ms. 3. 86.</ls> {@--3@} The cry of the (Indian) cuckoo; पिकेन रोषारुणचक्षुषा मुहुः कुहूरुताहूयत चंद्रवैरिणी <ls>N. 1. 100</ls>; उन्मीलंति कूहूः कुहूरिति कलोत्तालाः पिकानां गिरः <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> {@--4@} The first day of the first quarter on which the moon rises.
